ItemTooltip.WispinaBottle: Summons a Wisp to provide light
ItemTooltip.CursedSapling: Summons a cursed sapling to follow you
ItemTooltip.EatersBone: Summons a Baby Eater of Souls
ItemTooltip.DD2PetGhost: Summons a pet flickerwick to provide light
ItemTooltip.MagicLantern: Summons a magic lantern that exposes nearby treasure
ItemTooltip.CrimsonHeart: Summons a heart to provide light
ItemTooltip.DrillContainmentUnit:
Summons a rideable Drill mount
<left> to mine blocks, <right> to mine walls
ItemTooltip.ShrimpyTruffle: Attracts a legendary creature which flourishes in water & combat
ItemTooltip.GolfCart: Summons a rideable Golf Cart mount
ItemTooltip.QueenSlimeMountSaddle: Summons a rideable Winged Slime mount
ItemTooltip.PaintedHorseSaddle: Summons a rideable painted horse mount
ItemTooltip.MajesticHorseSaddle: Summons a rideable white horse mount
ItemTooltip.DarkHorseSaddle: Summons a rideable dark horse mount
ItemTooltip.PogoStick:
Summons a rideable pogo stick mount
Press Jump again in mid-air to do tricks!
ItemTooltip.DiggingMoleMinecart:
Will dig through blocks and lay new track if carrying minecart tracks
Only digs when underground
